description:
Capture your thoughts and send them to your email. This is an easy companion while you are driving and want to remember yourself. 

If your familiar with GTD this is the perfect tool to add to your capture toolset. 
This also is a great fit if you are using evernote, since you can send your captured voice memo directly to you evernote email account.
